Title: Add Initial Files
Description:
Branch this issue. Add files to repo. Contents can be found at [the source GitHub repo](https://github.com/mgmt-59000-devops/azure_python_function_app_start)

/label ~setup

Title: Add Azure Resources
Description:
Create a new Resource Group in the Azure web interface

/label ~setup ~azure

Title: Create Azure Service Principal
Description:
Create a new Service Principal (fake user) in the Azure web interface

/label ~setup ~azure

Title: Store secure values for variables
Description:
In a separate text document, store the values for the following:

AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID: 

AZURE_TENANT_ID:

AZURE_RESOURCE_GROUP:

AZURE_FUNCTION_APP_NAME:

AZURE_CLIENT_ID:

AZURE_CLIENT_SECRET:

Note that you should **never** store these in your repository outside of the settings pane.

/label ~setup ~azure

Title: Create Azure Function
Description:
Create a new Function App in the Azure web interface

/label ~setup ~azure

Title: Create Pipeline File (Build)
Description:
In the GitLab interface, branch this issue and create a new `.gitlab-ci.yml` file.

/label ~pipeline

Title: Update Pipeline File (Deploy)
Description:
In the GitLab interface, branch this issue and add deploy commands to the `.gitlab-ci.yml` file.

/label ~pipeline
